title: Post game doesn't load but I want to rep my toxic teammate
body: Great client. Post game doesn't load, I'm stuck here for few minutes and don't want to leave because I just had a really toxic teammate. Suggestion?

replies.body:
If you happened to grab any screenshots during that game, you can feel free to shoot those our way in a ticket and we can take a look at what happened. 

As for the post-game lobby never showing up, we might be able to fix that pretty easily. Check your client options in the upper right corner for something called **close client during game**. Make sure that is NOT checked, and you should be able to see post game quicker!
